page: MS60018: Technology Of Natural And Synthetic

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: General introduction basic concepts and definition, rubber plantation and production of natural rubber, chemistry of rubber and rubber additives (compounding of rubber, chemistry of vulcanization, degradation and aging of rubber), modification of rubber (chemical and physical), physics of rubber (theory of rubber elasticity), adhesion and rubber reinforcement, synthetic rubber, processing technology and manufacture of rubber products e.g. conveyor belts, automobile tyres, hoses etc. structure property applications of rubbers, analysis and testing of rubbers, current trends in rubber science and technology.
page: MS60018: Technology Of Natural And Synthetic
